trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dayton
There were no other sightings in Dayton on or around August 17th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on top of one of the buildings outside of Downtown Dayton with one of myfriends trying to take a picture of Downtown Dayton as the sun went down.I tookone picture of just the sky.At the time I did not notice anything,but when I gothome and looked looked at the picture of the sky I noticed three glowing ballsin a triangle formation.I have the picture if you would like to see it.
